org.jsfml.graphics

Interface ConstTexture

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Const
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Texture

    public interface ConstTexture
extends Const
    Interface for read-only textures.

    It provides methods to can gain information from a texture, but none to modify it in any way.

    Note that this interface is expected to be implemented by a Texture. It is not recommended to be implemented outside of the JSFML API.

    See Also:
    Const
